name: Pincher
content:
These weapons deliver an electromagnetic pulse that disrupts any item that requires a battery or an electric current to operate. 

Pincher weapons inflict lightning damage. If you roll a critical hit on the attack roll and the target is not immune or resistant to lightning damage, the target takes additional damage equal to twice the weaponâ€™s tech level, and the target has disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls until the beginning of your next turn.

Disruption: All functions of battery-powered technology on the target stops working until the end of your next turn.
